column4: can anyone tell me the best way to deal with a cooling problem or tell me what's wrong with my processor.  Whenever it goes above 55 C it will often freeze up.  Any help would be great
- check your bios thermal cutout settings - possibly (but unlikely) to be set low and instead of dropping Mhz stops CPU...
- also, could try running something intensive in a live distro for a little while to see if you have the same prob. If you don't, it's a config issue in your OS
